title: Password Manager Setup & Digital Safety in {{city_upper}}, FL
headline: Stop writing passwords on paper. Let's secure them properly.
description: We help {{city_upper}} residents secure their online accounts with encrypted password managers, strong passphrases, and multi-factor authentication. Stop password reuse and stay protected from breaches and phishing.

sections.heading: Did You Know?
paragraph: Over 80 percent of data breaches are caused by weak, reused, or exposed passwords.
Many people store passwords in browsers, where they can be stolen by malware or phishing pages without warning.
Password managers store credentials in encrypted vaults and can generate strong passphrases that are easier to remember and harder to crack.

sections.heading: What We Do
paragraph: We help you move away from risky password habits by setting up secure, easy-to-use tools that protect your most important accounts.
This service is ideal for individuals and families who want peace of mind without relying on sticky notes or browser autofill.
items: Install and configure a trusted password manager with encrypted storage
Import and audit your current passwords for weak or reused entries
Generate strong passphrases that are secure and memorable
Enable multi-factor authentication (MFA) for critical accounts
Check your credentials against public breach databases and assist with remediation

sections.heading: How It Works
paragraph: We start with a short consultation to understand your current setup and concerns.
Then we install your password manager of choice, walk you through secure usage, and help migrate your credentials.
Our goal is to leave you fully in control, confident using your tools, and better protected against password-related attacks.
items: Set up categories and vault organization based on your needs
Show you how to safely share, back up, and recover passwords if needed
